results.name: G.f.: x*(1+x)^2/(1-x^3).
comment: First differences are essentially A049347. The binomial transform yields 0, 1, 4, 10,... i.e. A111927 with the first two zeros removed. - _R. J. Mathar_, May 14 2008
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,1).
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 17 2007
